name: The Good, The Bad, and The Veggies
name_original: The Good, The Bad, and The Veggies
description:
Play inside the imagination of a boy who does not want to eat his veggies! In this fun and family-friendly 3rd person shooter game, save a small western town of veggies that has been overrun by grasshopper bandits!

*This project was made as a education project for VIST 405 at Texas A&M University*

Team Members:

Bianca Ramos, Sean Hollinshead, Amy Moynihan and Connor Wince
